item.title: [508] Adding colored fires to your server Noob friendly[508]
item.dc:creator: @TOKSICK TOKSICK
item.description:
@TOKSICK wrote:

Hello MoparScape! today i am happy because i have found out how to do item on item lol…ANYWAYS this is my first tutorial if you dont know what colored fires are well…you get colored fire starters from clue scrolls (might make a custom clue scroll tutorial soon) NOW! back on topic first i will just post the code and tell you where to put it then i will explain what each part dose

Difficultly : 1/10
Type: Copy and Paste
Base: Pali
Files: src -> palidino76 -> rs2 -> io -> packets -> ItemOnItem.java

[size=12pt]TESTED ON PALI[/size]
but should work with every 508 or even 508+ idk

Go to your ItemOnItem.java and Copy this somewhere (someone without java knowledge could figure out where:P)

if (itemUsed == 590 && usedWith == 7406 || itemUsed == 7406 && usedWith == 590) { //Blue Fire if (player.skillLvl[11] >= 1) { player.addSkillXP(500 ,11); player.requestAnim(733, 0); player.frames.createGlobalObject(6009, player.heightLevel, player.absX, player.absY, 0, 10); player.objectX = player.absX; player.objectY = player.absY; player.objectHeight = player.heightLevel; pi.deleteItem(player, 7406, pi.getItemSlot(player, 7406), 1); player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You set the logs on fire."); player.fmwalk(player.absY, player.absY); player.firedelay = 100; } } if (itemUsed == 590 && usedWith == 7404 || itemUsed == 7404 && usedWith == 590) { //Red Fire if (player.skillLvl[11] >= 1) { player.addSkillXP(500 ,11); player.requestAnim(733, 0); player.frames.createGlobalObject(6009, player.heightLevel, player.absX, player.absY, 0, 10); player.objectX = player.absX; player.objectY = player.absY; player.objectHeight = player.heightLevel; pi.deleteItem(player, 7404, pi.getItemSlot(player, 7404), 1); player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You set the logs on fire."); player.fmwalk(player.absY, player.absY); player.firedelay = 100; } } if (itemUsed == 590 && usedWith == 7405 || itemUsed == 7405 && usedWith == 590) { //Green Fire if (player.skillLvl[11] >= 1) { player.addSkillXP(500 ,11); player.requestAnim(733, 0); player.frames.createGlobalObject(6009, player.heightLevel, player.absX, player.absY, 0, 10); player.objectX = player.absX; player.objectY = player.absY; player.objectHeight = player.heightLevel; pi.deleteItem(player, 7405, pi.getItemSlot(player, 7405), 1); player.frames.sendMessage(player, "You set the logs on fire."); player.fmwalk(player.absY, player.absY); player.firedelay = 100; } }
NOW! i will only explain it for one fire because well its the same thing?
Oh and also im not that good with explaining stuff so ill try my best
||
itemUsed == 590 meaning you have selected the Tinderbox as use
&& usedWith == 7405 meaning you have used the tinderbox with the logs

&& usedWith == 7405 meaning you have selected the Tinderbox as use
itemUsed == 590 meaning you have selected the logs with the Tinderbox

if (itemUsed == 590 && usedWith == 7405 || itemUsed == 7405 && usedWith == 590) {

[size=18pt]IM SORRY I WILL HAVE TO FINISH THIS LATER! LIKE SOON AS IN TODAY BUT LATER ANYWAYS I HOPE I HELPED[/size]
